mapper.select: SELECT c.num, c.userId, creatorName, c.num, courseName, content, price, TO_CHAR(c.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, c.enabled, category FROM course c JOIN member1 m1 ON c.userId=m1.userId JOIN courseCategory cc ON c.categoryNum=cc.categoryNum JOIN creatorInfo i ON c.userId=i.userId WHERE i.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY c.num DESC

SELECT b.num, courseName, content, price, recommended, b.reg_date, tag, recommended, b.imageFile, courseLevel, b.categoryNum, c.category, NVL(courseLikeCount, 0) courseLikeCount FROM course b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId JOIN courseCategory c ON b.categoryNum = c.categoryNum JOIN creatorInfo i ON b.userId=i.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) courseLikeCount FROM courseLike GROUP BY num ) bc ON b.num = bc.num WHERE b.num = #{num}
SELECT stateNum , courseNum, stateCode, memo, registerId, sReg_date FROM courseState WHERE courseNum = #{num} ORDER BY stateNum DESC
